long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you often feel down when you read news? Yet there are so many people out there doing amazing things helping to solve many of our problems. How come we so rarely get to see these mentioned in the news?

Uplifters is here to take care of this and add a couple of positive news among those we see on common news websites.

Hand-picked news about nature, environment, business and constructive actions from around the internet, one per day or two. No ads.

Currently works on BBC, NY Times, The Guardian, CNN and around 15 more pages.

Visit https://uplifters.github.io for more information.
